    public class MXCConstructorIncModifier

    A class which increments the initial values of barriers, latches and semaphores in a compilation unit

    • Method Detail

      • visit

        public com.github.javaparser.ast.Node visit​(com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.ObjectCreationExpr oc,
                                            java.lang.Void arg)
        A method which walks through all the object creations expressions in a compilation unit If the object creation expression is a semaphore, countdownlatch or cyclicbarrer, and marked as the current concurrency object for mutation its initial value is incremented

        The line reference and method name of the semaphore mutant is set in the MutationModifier superclass.

        If the current object creation expression is a semaphore, cyclicbarrier or countdownlatch, but is not marked for mutation, no action is performed and the mutationsVisited value of the MutationModifier superclass is incremented.

        Specified by:
        visit in interface com.github.javaparser.ast.visitor.GenericVisitor<com.github.javaparser.ast.visitor.Visitable,​java.lang.Void>
        Overrides:
        visit in class com.github.javaparser.ast.visitor.ModifierVisitor<java.lang.Void>
        Parameters:
        oc - - the current object creation expression
        arg - - always null
        Returns:
        - the object creation expression with any modifications applied
